item.title: Cyberattack hits major Japanese beverage producer, affecting its operations
item.description: A major Japanese beverage producer has been hit by a cyberattack this week which has disrupted shipments and operations

item.title: Parents of woman killed in Tesla crash allege design flaw trapped her in burning car
item.description: A lawsuit filed Thursday by parents of a college student killed in a Tesla crash says she was trapped inside as the car burned because of a design fla...

item.title: India and China to resume direct flights after a 5-year suspension
item.description: India and China plan to resume direct flights between some of their cities after a five-year suspension

item.title: Asian shares are mixed as tech shares lead Wall Street ticks to more records
item.description: Asian shares are mixed after U.S. stocks rose to more records on heavy buying of technology shares

item.title: Brazil’s lower house approves an increase in tax exemptions for low-income people
item.description: Brazil’s lower house has approved exempting up to 5,000 reais, or about $940, a month from income taxes
